
## whichToFill {.unnumbered}


### Description

Finds pixels in the plot that shouldn't be white and makes them black. 
Quick and helpful cleaning for before the thinning algorithm runs.



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>whichToFill(img)
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="img">img</code></td>
<td>
A binary matrix.
</td></tr>
</table>


### Value

A cleaned up image.
